name: CompressorBot
description: A Normal Telegram Bot Which can Compress/encode/ Generate Samples of videos.

API_HASH.description: You api hash, from my.telegram.org or @apiScrapperRoBot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather, and enter it's api token here.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Create a private group/channel. Add @missrose_bot and your bot + make admin. Do /id. Paste that here

OWNER_ID.description: Get ur Id Of Telegram nd Paste Here.
